alert.note: Alert for Hughes (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 12:21AM MDT until July 04 at 1:30AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAND...SOUTHERN HYDE...SOUTHEASTERN HUGHES...CENTRAL LYMAN AND CENTRAL BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 120 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tailrace Rec Area, or near Fort Thompson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lees Corner, Shelby, Crow Creek Housing and Etbauer Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
